QuestData.Title: Pierce Their Heart!
QuestData.Description: There...$b$bThe blood of the fallen Kaldorei is turned. It can now be used on the Forest Heart in Dor'Danil Barrow Den. Doing so will utterly corrupt it.$b$bThe sacred relic of the arrogant elves will be turned against them. How poetic!$b$b<Durak laughs cruelly.>$b$bThe barrow den lies nestled against the hills to the southeast. One of my imps has laid a blood trail from the entrance to the heart.$b$bMake haste! Kadrak is not likely to be in a patient mood.$b$bOff you go, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Durak wants you to use the Tainted Blood of the Kaldorei on the Forest Heart.
QuestData.RewardText: It is done?$b$bGood work, $n. That will gradually weaken their forces, as well as their spirit.
